3.Summary: "I am a high school student my last year in high school looking for a after school job"

4.Pros: Free food during the midnight shift

5.Pros: As long as you get to the right store, it's like a family environment. Worked at one store for almost two years, even met my now boyfriend there. They did everything to make sure you were treated right and you felt like you were part of the family.
5.Cons: Be careful with certain stores. When I got transferred to a literal just built new location, everything went down south. No one had respect for each other and there was no teamwork. The managers decided to treat you like you are their slave. There's good stores and then there's those bad stores that make you wish you never got hired.
